short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes a few things rom the Strava site like things about challenges, posts about Strava news and so on. And stupid workouts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension removes less interesting information from the Strava dashboard when logged in. For example it removes information about monthly challenges. It also removes Strava announcements. 

When installing this extension you get a cleaner Strava experience that lets you focus more on your and your friends training sessions and races.
